byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Among the more unusual supporters of AT&T's $39 billion deal for T-Mobile USA is the Shreveport-Bossier Rescue Mission, a Louisiana homeless shelter.
snippet: Among the more unusual supporters of AT&T's $39 billion deal for T-Mobile USA is the Shreveport-Bossier Rescue Mission, a Louisiana homeless shelter.
